subject: Instant Replay (Sports)
Baseball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In a demonstration Wednesday, two Major League Baseball officials played the roles of an umpire in Manhattan and an umpire calling from Arizona to report a manager’s challenge to a play.
snippet: In a demonstration Wednesday, two Major League Baseball officials played the roles of an umpire in Manhattan and an umpire calling from Arizona to report a manager’s challenge to a play.
